## hpr0448 :: TiT Radio 008 - Something Kinda Tacky

 Recorded Live Sept. 5th, 2009; monsterb and friends talk about a perl
script called exiftool,  Jibbed a NetBSD livecd,  something
shocking on Planet Gnome,  Hannah Montana distro, and so much
more.  Please take a look at the shownotes for detailed
information.  https://titradio.info/008.html
